snippet.title: Thomas & Friends: Right on Time Plug and Play TV Game - Full Playthrough (US)
snippet.description:
This is by far my longest gameplay video yet, and quite possibly the longest video on my channel. I remember getting this game back in a thrift store when I was little. I remember having loads of fun with it! This has to be my favorite Thomas & Friends game, besides the Kids Station PS1 Thomas game. I just love the fact that you can not only just play as Thomas, Percy and James, but Emily and Molly too (who are both underrated characters IMO)! When I first tested recording this game, there were some weird screen glitchy things going on, and that was probably cause of the old capture card I had, so I got a new one and now it's perfectly fine. I apologize for such a long video, I still hope you enjoyed it nonetheless!

Custom thumbnail by me

Follow me on DeviantArt:
https://www.deviantart.com/percysailormoon2002

Follow me on Twitter:
https://twitter.com/PASMF2002

#fuck
just to keep my comments
